Author: andrewjchapin
Title: [ANN] TREVI TOKEN, SMART CONTRACT BACKED PERSONAL SAVINGS ðŸ’°
Body: WEBSITE - WHITEPAPER  Introduction of Trevi:      Trevi  Smart contract backed personal savings.  WHY TREVI? 69% of Americans have $0 in savings. The only app that lets you set rules for saving, powered by micro-transactions.  Set aside money for saving every time money leaves your bank account.  No debit card required.  Built on Blockchain, governed by Smart Contracts.  FDIC Insured accounts backed by BBVA Compass Bank.  Our Official Bitcointalk Trevi handle is @AmishCEO   NOTE: THERE ARE NO OTHER OFFICIAL HANDLES.  WE WILL NOT ASK FOR ANY SENSITIVE INFORMATION OVER BITCOINTALK.  HOW TREVI WORKS   IMPORTANT LINKS - Token Homepage: https://www.trevilabs.co/ - White paper: https://docs.wixstatic.com/ugd/f7d204_c047133883c4494ba30aa1c34af46f18.pdf - Twitter: https://twitter.com/trevi_co - Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Trevi.Co/ - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/17773914/  OFFERING DETAILS Tokens Generated: 1 billion Trevi Token (TT) Private Sale: 2 million TT 01/29/2018-02/11/2018 Public Token Sale 4 million TT: 03/01/2018-05/01/2018  USE OF FUNDS Technology: 4% Development: 16% Payroll: 46% Operations: 20% Marketing: 14%  TREVI FEATURES   TEAM - Miriam Jones - CEO - 11 Years CEO Experience - Michael Carian - CCO - Art Director - Cashmere Agency - Saf Elmansour - CMO - Head of Mobile Marketing - USA Today - Tommy Goode - CTO - Senior Dev - Verigo - Andrew J. Chapin - Advisor - Founder benja/benjaCoin, Author "Art of the Initial Coin Offering"

Author: supermario64
Title: [ANN] TREVI TOKEN, SMART CONTRACT BACKED PERSONAL SAVINGS ðŸ’°
Body: How do I get us dollar into Trevi for easy saavings?

Author: AmishCeo
Title: [ANN] TREVI TOKEN, SMART CONTRACT BACKED PERSONAL SAVINGS ðŸ’°
Body: You simply link your bank account. Set up how much extra you wish to charge and  transfer with each of your daily purchases. Finally, you set up your withdrawal  rules. You can choose to withdraw your funds on a recurring  schedule, or a single date in the future, or when you reach your goal amount. Once you decide we will lock your account to help you reach your goal!

Author: Maizina
Title: [ANN] TREVI TOKEN, SMART CONTRACT BACKED PERSONAL SAVINGS ðŸ’°
Body: I will keen an eye on this project. Is Pre Mined?

Author: AmishCeo
Title: [ANN] TREVI TOKEN, SMART CONTRACT BACKED PERSONAL SAVINGS ðŸ’°
Body: If I understand this correctly, you are asking if you can survive if your money is locked away?  To answer: Trevi allows you to customize your account. You can add multiple accounts with different goals. You can opt not to lock funds away for a specified purpose. Our features are designed to give you flexibility based on your own needs. We do not automatically block you from gaining access to funds. You the user, will have to customize your account(s) and we ensure there is follow through.

Author: AmishCeo
Title: [ANN] TREVI TOKEN, SMART CONTRACT BACKED PERSONAL SAVINGS ðŸ’°
Body: We are pre-mined. Our Alpha is in progress. You can view screenshots on our website: trevilabs.co  Our tokens act as a store of value on the platform. Conversion between fiat/crypto will happen with each initial deposit/withdrawal depending on how our users decide to use the platform. We can handle straight fiat transactions. Or we can accept crypto purchases of tokens to store on the trevi platform to be converted to fiat/crypto upon withdrawal.

Author: AmishCeo
Title: [ANN] TREVI TOKEN, SMART CONTRACT BACKED PERSONAL SAVINGS ðŸ’°
Body: We here agree! Saving and budgeting are time consuming, and the mental cost is high. For most people living average lives where families and free time are a priority, there simply isn't anything worse than the daily and difficult chore of budgeting and saving. Trevi is the only platform that allows you to set aside funds with no worries of unexpected debits, fees, overdrafts, or impulse purchases that set you back!

Title: [ANN] TREVI TOKEN, SMART CONTRACT BACKED PERSONAL SAVINGS ðŸ’°
